Characters

Class MainCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Characters.NonStationaryCharacter
      • Characters.MainCharacter

  • public class MainCharacter
extends NonStationaryCharacter
    MainCharacter class implements methods to update the character. This includes character movement and input handling for player controls.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Brendan, Stephen Dao

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Characters.NonStationaryCharacter

        x, y

      static MainCharacter getMainCharacter(int x, int y)
      Creates an instance of MainCharacter and sets the starting coordinates if there is currently no other instance of this class.
      protected boolean isColliding(Tile currentTile)
      Checks if the player is colliding with a reward tile.
      void keyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
      Handles player movement in response to a key input.
      protected void move()
      Handles game behaviour when player changes position.
      static MainCharacter restartMainCharacter(int x, int y)
      Creates a new instance of MainCharacter and sets the starting coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • getMainCharacter

        public static MainCharacter getMainCharacter(int x,
                                             int y)
        Creates an instance of MainCharacter and sets the starting coordinates if there is currently no other instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        x - starting x position
        y - starting y position
        Returns:
        an instance of a MainCharacter object

      • restartMainCharacter

        public static MainCharacter restartMainCharacter(int x,
                                                 int y)
        Creates a new instance of MainCharacter and sets the starting coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - starting x position
        y - starting y position
        Returns:
        an instance of a MainCharacter object

      • move

        protected void move()
        Handles game behaviour when player changes position.

      • isColliding

        protected boolean isColliding(Tile currentTile)
        Checks if the player is colliding with a reward tile.
        Parameters:
        currentTile - a Tile object corresponding to the player's current position
        Returns:
        true if the player is on a reward tile, else false

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
        Handles player movement in response to a key input.
        Parameters:
        e - a KeyEvent key input
